post0.title: Title
post0.content: > "My first blog post" - toc: true - branch: master - badges: true - comments: true - author: JJ Hoffstein - categories: [] . Hi - this is my first blog post. I've gotten interested in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence, and now here I am blogging about it. My hope is that blogging will help clarify my thoughts, sharpen my ideas, and elicit feedback from others. . To that end, my goal is to remain faithful to Professor James Miller's three pieces of writing advice: be clear, be concise, be interesting -- in that order of importance. . twitter: https://twitter.com/JimDMiller/status/1376642170694860805?s=20 .
